page.title: 12SCHOOLS
page.content: SCHOOL-UMBERLEIGH The school was built in 1913, there were 36 pupils as at July 1985 with 2 full-time and 2 part-time teachers. There are two classrooms one of which divides into two with a folding floor to ceiling wooden screen. There is a small playground which goes all around the building. This has a trainer swimming pool,climbing frames and various floor markings for games such as hopscotch. The toilets are in a separate building across the playground. They do not yet have hot water connected.
